name: Neutralizing Emotional Triggers
description: Eliminating vulnerability to emotional provocation and remaining composed under pressure.

cards.title: The Art of Emotional Detachment
cards.description: Training to remain emotionally unaffected by manipulative tactics.
bulletpoints: Developing mental compartmentalization techniques to prevent emotional hijacking.
Using cognitive distance to observe interactions objectively.
Recognizing and neutralizing subconscious emotional anchors tied to manipulation.

cards.title: Neutralizing Guilt-Tripping and Shame Tactics
cards.description: Preventing manipulators from leveraging guilt or shame against you.
bulletpoints: Recognizing when guilt-tripping is being used as a psychological weapon.
Using logical breakdowns to dismantle baseless accusations.
Rejecting shame-based conditioning through self-validation techniques.

cards.title: Countering Emotional Blackmail
cards.description: Resisting coercion tactics designed to provoke compliance.
bulletpoints: Recognizing threats disguised as concern, care, or necessity.
Refusing to engage with 'If you donâ€™t do X, then Y will happen' ultimatums.
Using calculated indifference to neutralize emotional leverage attempts.
